name: Cursed Cave (DerpyDino35)
description:
IF YOU ARE THINKING OF PLAYING THIS "GAME", DON'T
this game was made in roughly 5-6 hours for the Wowie Jam 4.0, in which i ran out of time to actually make it good
it has no menus, sounds, or good gameplay

i wasn't going to submit this hunk of junk, until i realized this could make good content


anyways haha
even my first game is better than this, so if this is your first impression of me, pleeeeeease play literally any other game of mine



without further ado, heres how to play / theme




///////////////////////

HOW TO PLAY:
Controls - WASD / Arrow Keys, Mouse Click
Objective - Kill the Orcs and rescue the Boy

THEME:
1.) Every single asset you see, including the itch icon, was made with either a Sprite Generator or Craiyon {{{i guess everything except the exclamation & question mark}}}

2.) Each time you play the cave is randomly generated {{{i mean you don't really collaborate it, but whatever}}

3.) The Orc is also AI {{{i mean you don't really collaborate it, but whatever}}

////////////////////////

other than that uh
yeah
